response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth considering an investment of $1,400,000 for this remarkable item. This price reflects not only the cost of production and development but also the unique advantages and exclusivity this product provides. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you, aligning perfectly with your business objectives and enhancing your market position. Should you be interested in exploring further, please let us know so we can arrange a detailed discussion. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
